mapper.update: update IM_METADATA set DEL_FLG = '1' where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into IM_METADATA (PK_ID, DS_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, TB_NAME, STATUS, TYPE) values (#{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uptUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uptTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update IM_METADATA set DS_ID = #{dsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLG = #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, CRT_USER = #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRT_TIME = #{crtTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPT_USER = #{uptUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPT_TIME = #{uptTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TB_NAME = #{tbName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PK_ID, DS_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, TB_NAME, STATUS, TYPE from IM_METADATA where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select PK_ID, DS_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, TB_NAME, STATUS, TYPE from IM_METADATA where DEL_FLG = '0' order by NAME asc

select IM.PK_ID, IM.DS_ID, IM.NAME, IM.DESCRIPTION, IM.NOTE, IM.DEL_FLG, IM.CRT_USER, IM.CRT_TIME, IM.UPT_USER, IM.UPT_TIME, IM.TB_NAME, IM.STATUS, IM.TYPE, CD.NAME AS DS_NAME, CD.TYPE as DS_TYPE, CD.DESCRIPTION as DS_DESC from IM_METADATA IM left join COM_DATASOURCE CD on IM.DS_ID = CD.PK_ID and CD.DEL_FLG = '0' where IM.DEL_FLG = '0' and IM.PK_ID = #{pkId} and IM.DS_ID = #{dsId} and IM.NAME like '%' || #{name} || '%' and IM.DESCRIPTION like '%' || #{describe} || '%' and IM.TB_NAME like '%' || #{tbName} || '%' and IM.NOTE like '%' || #{note} || '%' and IM.TYPE = #{type} and IM.STATUS = #{status} and IM.CRT_TIME >= #{crtTimeStart} and #{crtTimeEnd} >= IM.CRT_TIME and IM.UPT_TIME >= #{uptTimeStart} and #{uptTimeEnd} >= IM.UPT_TIME and IM.CRT_USER like '%' || #{crtUser} || '%' and IM.UPT_USER like '%' || #{uptUser} || '%' order by IM.NAME asc
select PK_ID, DS_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, TB_NAME, STATUS, TYPE from IM_METADATA where DEL_FLG = '0' and NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select IM.PK_ID, IM.DS_ID, IM.NAME, IM.DESCRIPTION, IM.NOTE, IM.DEL_FLG, IM.CRT_USER, IM.CRT_TIME, IM.UPT_USER, IM.UPT_TIME, IM.TB_NAME, IM.STATUS, IM.TYPE, CD.NAME AS DS_NAME, CD.TYPE as DS_TYPE, CD.DESCRIPTION as DS_DESC from IM_METADATA IM left join COM_DATASOURCE CD on CD.PK_ID = IM.DS_ID left join T_GF_DICT TGD on TGD.DICT_ID = CD.TYPE where IM.DEL_FLG = '0' and IM.STATUS = '2' and TGD.DICT_TYPE_ID = 'IM_DS_TARGET_BATCH_TYPE' and TGD.DICT_TYPE_ID = 'IM_DS_TARGET_REALTIME_TYPE' order by IM.NAME asc
